definition: Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: An estimated fifth of them are in the country illegally.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，这些拉美裔人口中约五分之一都是非法移民。

sentences.english: Rio group summit will set up a Latin American and Caribbean States Community.
sentences.chinese: 里约集团峰会将成立拉美及加勒比国家共同体。

sentences.english: This music expressed the happiness and the pain of life in Latin American communities.
sentences.chinese: 这种音乐所表达的幸福和生活在拉美社区的痛苦。

sentences.english: The survey highlighted positive action in Latin American countries.
sentences.chinese: 该调查突出提到了拉美各国的积极行动。

sentences.english: Novoa also introduced the situation in the Latin American area.
sentences.chinese: 诺沃亚还介绍了拉美地区的形势。

sentences.english: Latin America meets East Asia in Los Angeles in one savory bite.
sentences.chinese: 一口美味佳淆，使拉美与东亚在洛杉矶交融。

sentences.english: Volley ball was dominated by Latin Americans in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 年的排坛被拉美选手所控制。

sentences.english: They would help them, get them in touch with the right people.
sentences.chinese: 学生们可以协助那些拉美家庭找到并联系对的人帮忙。

sentences.english: You'll see that Hispanics have already contributed so much to this country.
sentences.chinese: 你会看到拉美裔已经为这个国家贡献了这么多。

sentences.english: Chinese scholars began the study on indentured Chinese labor in Latin America in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 中国学者对拉美华侨的研究始于1960年代。

sentences.english: In the past Hispanics remained disproportionately poor and working class.
sentences.chinese: 过去，贫穷人口和劳工阶层始终占拉美裔的很大比例。

sentences.english: Russia also had launched recently a series of high-sounding talk activity in the Latin American area.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯最近在拉美地区也展开了一系列高调活动。

sentences.english: Its stake in PAE is one of the company's most prized Latin American assets.
sentences.chinese: PAE股权是BP最有价值的拉美资产之一。

sentences.english: In Europe and Latin America, up to 40% of toilet paper comes from recycled products.
sentences.chinese: 在欧洲和拉美，高达40%的厕纸是再生纸。

sentences.english: It is extending its trade tentacles into Africa and Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 它正在把贸易触手延及非洲，乃至拉美。

sentences.english: In Latin America, Brazil was the first to feel it.
sentences.chinese: 在拉美地区，巴西是首个感受到影响的国家。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]

pinyin: Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1
